programs.name: Exhibitor Hall
programs.description: Browse fanmade merchandise drawn or designed by local artists in the Artist Alley, or check out items sold by industry vendors.

programs.name: Performances
programs.description: View live performances including an orchestra and rock band in the East Ballroom.

programs.name: Cosplay Masquerade
programs.description: Our annual cosplay contest is held in the East Ballroom.

programs.name: Raffles
programs.description: Earn an additional raffle ticket by completing our Scavenger Hunt.

programs.name: Panels and Game Shows
programs.description: We have panels and game shows for your enjoyment run by students and alumni. Check them out!

programs.name: Manga Library
programs.description: Relax and enjoy reading some of our manga collections in the Roger Revelle room.
